name: z80-base
description: Base classes and utilities for Z80 emulation
author: Lawrence Kesteloot <lk@teamten.com> (https://www.teamten.com/lawrence/)

scripts.build: npm run build:main && npm run build:module
scripts.docs: typedoc -p . --target es6 --excludeNotExported --excludePrivate --out docs src && touch docs/.nojekyll
